title: Full Stack Developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining both front-end and back-end components of our web applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop front-end website architecture using React.js
- Design and develop APIs using Node.js
- Work with databases and data storage solutions
- Ensure responsiveness of applications

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in full stack development
- Proficiency in JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
- Experience with database technologies like MongoDB or PostgreSQL
- Knowledge of version control systems like Git

title: Marketing Specialist
description:
GrowthX Marketing is seeking a talented Marketing Specialist to help develop and implement marketing strategies for our clients. The ideal candidate will have experience in digital marketing and content creation.

Responsibilities:
- Create and manage digital marketing campaigns
- Develop content for social media platforms
- Analyze campaign performance and metrics
- Collaborate with the design team on marketing materials

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
- 2+ years of experience in digital marketing
- Excellent writing and communication skills
- Experience with social media management tools

title: Customer Support Representative
description:
ConnectRwanda is looking for a Customer Support Representative to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will provide exceptional customer service to our clients via email, phone, and chat.

Responsibilities:
- Respond to customer inquiries via multiple channels
- Troubleshoot basic technical issues
- Escalate complex issues to the appropriate departments
- Maintain customer records and documentation

Requirements:
- Excellent communication skills in English and Kinyarwanda
- Previous customer service experience
- Basic troubleshooting skills
- Ability to work in shifts

title: Project Manager
description:
BuildRite Construction is seeking an experienced Project Manager to oversee construction projects from inception to completion. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in construction management and excellent leadership skills.

Responsibilities:
- Plan and schedule project timelines
- Coordinate with contractors and suppliers
- Monitor project progress and budgets
- Ensure compliance with safety regulations

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Construction Management or related field
- 5+ years of experience in construction project management
- Strong leadership and communication skills
- Knowledge of construction regulations in Rwanda

title: Administrative Assistant
description:
Global Health Partners is looking for an Administrative Assistant to support our office operations. The ideal candidate will be organized, detail-oriented, and have excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities:
- Manage calendars and schedule meetings
- Handle correspondence and phone calls
- Organize files and documents
- Assist with event planning and coordination

Requirements:
- Associate's degree or equivalent experience
- 1+ years of administrative experience
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite
- Strong organizational skills
